control.description-key: Control enables seamless browsing of SharePoint documents in a manner similar to Windows Explorer. The user-friendly interface displays the entire folder hierarchy, offering the ability to quickly locate specific folders by name. This feature ensures swift access to the required files, enhancing overall efficiency.

property.name: minHeight
property.description-key: Minimum height of the control in pixels

property.name: hideFoldersPane
property.description-key: Define if folders navigation pane should be hidden (by default it is visible)
